review.title: “Great place to work while working toward a degree or other personal goals”
review.pros: Pros – The management has a great understanding that most employees are there while working toward other professional goals. Very understanding of school schedules and time off for personal reasons. Great part time pay, and fun and flexible work environment.
review.cons: Cons – No benefits, but most employees are covered through other sources (students). Some long shifts with little time for rest.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
